name: The Birthday (Fika)
description:
This is Studio 399 contribution to Weekly Game Jam , week: 108.

This game was created from the ground up in 6 Days with all new assets. 

Plot:

You take the role as Ben and it's his birthday, but something is really wrong. Where's his parents and who is calling for  him  downstairs?

Credits:
